name: top_comments_by_username
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool reddit.
Tool description: Please join our telegram channel to get notified about updates. https://t.me/social_miner_news
API description: Fetches the top comments by a specific Reddit username within a given time frame.

time.description: The time frame for which to fetch top comments. Choices include 'hour', 'day', 'week', 'month', 'year', or 'all'.

username.description: The Reddit username for which to fetch the top comments.

cursor.description: A cursor for pagination to fetch the next set of results. Defaults to None.
